name: Enchanting Kerala
description:
Kerala, “God’s Own Country” is the best place to explore the splendid beauty of the nature. Lying on the Malabar Coast, Kerala boast of its rich greenery and the tranquil backwaters. Due to unending beauty of the nature, Kerala is also referred as one of the “50 Must See Destinations of a Lifetime” and “10 Paradises on the World”. Starting from the endless tea gardens to the spice plantations, the chains of tranquil river islands to elegant houseboats, Kerala is the perfect blend of beauty within folds of nature.

This tour package starts from Cochin and heads towards Munnar. After exploring the beauty of Munnar, Periyar National Park and other significant locations, this tour gradually ends in Trivandrum, the capital of Kerala. This package has been designed in a way, so that almost all the corners of Kerala can be explored.
